source_sentence: 長爪梵志請問經
translation: Sutra of the Questions of Brahmā with Long Jaw

source_sentence: 大唐三藏法師義淨奉　制譯
translation: Translated by the Tripiṭaka Master Yijing of the Great Tang

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時，薄伽梵在王舍城鷲峯山中，與大苾芻眾千二百五十人俱，并餘苾芻、苾芻尼、近事男、近事女、國王、大臣、沙門、婆羅門、外道之類，天、龍、藥叉、人非人等，瞻仰而住。
translation: Thus I have heard: One time, the Bhagavān was staying in Vulture Peak in Rājagṛha with a great congregation of 2,250 monks, along with other monks, nuns, laymen, laywomen, kings, ministers, ascetics, priests, heretics, gods, dragons, yakṣas, humans, and nonhumans who looked up to him.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊為說自證微妙之法，所謂初中後善，文義巧妙，純一圓滿，清淨鮮白，梵行之相。
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān explained the subtle Dharma of self-realization, which is called the junior and the latter good, which is clever in meaning, pure and complete, clean and pure white, and the characteristics of the religious practice.

source_sentence: 爾時，有一長爪梵志，來詣佛所，策杖而立，問言：「喬答摩！
translation: At the time, a priest with a long claw came to the Buddha, stood up with his staff, and asked, "Gautama!

source_sentence: 汝曾實作如是宣說，世由自業，業為能授，業為生處，業為親族，業為所依耶！」
translation: Have you ever truly declared that the world is caused by one's own actions, that actions are capable of being conferred, that actions are birthplaces, that actions are relatives, and that actions are foundations?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我作是說，世由自業，業為能授，業為生處，業為親族，業為所依。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "I say this, 'The world comes from its own actions, actions are capable of being conferred, actions are birthplaces, actions are relatives, and actions are foundations.'"

source_sentence: 婆羅門曰：「若如是者，沙門喬答摩！
translation: The brāhmaṇa said, "If that's the case, ascetic Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得金剛不壞堅固之身？」
translation: What karma did you previously perform that enabled you to attain the indestructible body of Vajra?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離殺害有情命根，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "In a previous life, I parted with the life root of killing sentient beings, and because of the power of their actions, I now have this result."

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: "Śrāmaṇer Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得手指纖長網縵為相？」
translation: What karma did you previously perform that allowed you to acquire the characteristic of long, slender webbed fingers?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離偷盜他人財物，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "In a previous life, I had refrained from stealing another person's property, and because of the power of that activity, I now have this result."

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: "Śrāmaṇer Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得具足色力諸根圓滿？」
translation: What prior action did you take that enabled you to attain the full completion of the faculties endowed with the power of form?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離女人欲染之事，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "In a previous life, I kept away from the defiled world of women's desires, and because of the power of their actions, I now have this result."

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: "Śrīmāyū Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得出廣長舌，自覆其面？」
translation: What karma did you previously perform that allowed you to develop a long, broad tongue that covers your own face?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離妄語詭誑於人，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "In a previous life, I was free of lying and deceiving people, and because of the power of their actions, I now have this result."

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: "Śrāmaṇer Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得威儀庠序，如師子行？」
translation: What karma did you previously perform that enabled you to attain the dignified and peaceful conduct of a lion?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離諸酒放逸之處，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "In a previous life, I left the place of debauchery and alcohol, and because of the power of my actions, I now have this result."

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: "Śrāmaṇer Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得微妙相好，莊嚴其身？」
translation: What actions did you previously perform that enabled you to attain the subtle appearance that adorns your body?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離歌舞倡艶之事，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "In a previous life, I stayed away from singing, dancing, and dancing, and because of the power of those activities, I've now attained this result."

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: "Śrāmaṇer Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得上妙香氣，芬馥其身？」
translation: What karma did you do first to obtain a wonderful fragrance that would perfume your body?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離香花瓔珞莊飾，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "In a previous life, I was free of flowers, fragrances, and jewelry, and it was because of the power of my actions that I now have this result."

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: "Śrāmaṇer Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得受用金剛勝妙之座？」
translation: What karma did you previously perform that enabled you to attain the use of the adamantine seat of excellence?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離高床大床驕恣之物，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "In a previous life, I had parted with the proud possessions of a high bed or a large seat, and because of the power of those actions, I now have this result."

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: "Śrāmaṇer Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得四十牙齒鮮白齊平？」
translation: What work did you do previously that enabled you to obtain forty teeth that are perfectly white and even?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，遠離非時飲噉諸食，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "In a previous life, I avoided eating food at an inappropriate time, and because of the power of my actions, I now have this result."

source_sentence: 「沙門喬答摩！
translation: "Śrāmaṇer Gautama!

source_sentence: 先作何業，令汝獲得頂上肉髻圓滿姝好？」
translation: What karma did you previously perform that enabled you to attain the full beauty of the topknot?"

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「我於前生，於三寶、二師沙門、婆羅門、父母、尊長，應恭敬處，五輪著地，以無慢心虔誠致禮，由彼業力，今獲斯果。」
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "In a previous life, I had respected the Three Treasures, two masters, ascetics, Brāhmaṇas, parents, and venerable elders, placed my five wheels on the ground, and paid reverence with no conceit.

source_sentence: 時婆羅門，見佛為說因果不虛，白言：「喬答摩！
translation: Seeing that the Buddha's teaching about the reality of cause and effect wasn't false, the brāhmaṇa said, "Gautama!

source_sentence: 此名何福？
translation: What is the merit of this name?

source_sentence: 云何受持？」
translation: How do we receive and maintain it?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「此名八支淨戒，若能一日一夜，或復長時，從師受持，獲果如是。」
translation: The Buddha said, "These are called the eight pure precepts, and if you can receive and uphold them from a teacher for a day or a night or even for a long time, you'll attain their result like this."

source_sentence: 爾時長爪梵志，既於佛所聞說八支日夜淨戒，由先遠離鄙惡業故，便能獲得勝妙莊嚴，深心信受，歡喜踊躍，即於佛前捨高慢心，投杖于地，合掌恭敬，禮佛雙足，白言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the priest with the long claws who had heard the Buddha teach the eightfold daily and nightly pure precepts, and who, because he had previously parted with despicable bad karma, had been able to attain marvelous adornment, profoundly believed and accepted them, rejoiced, and jumped for joy.

source_sentence: 我今始知善惡之業感報不虛，我從今日乃至盡形，歸依佛陀兩足中尊；乃至盡形，歸依達磨離欲中尊；乃至盡形，歸依僧伽諸眾中尊。
translation: Now, I've come to know that the results of good and bad actions are not in vain, and I've reverted from this day until the end of my life to the Buddha as the two-legged one, to Bodhidharma as the one who's free of desire, and to the Saṃgha as the one who's honored among the others.

source_sentence: 我受八支近住淨戒，始從今時，乃至明旦日出已來，於其中間：「不害一切命，　　不盜他財物，　不婬不妄語，　　飲酒放逸處，　花莊及歌舞，　　高大非時食，　我今悉遠離，　　受持淨八支。」
translation: From now until sunrise tomorrow, I've received the eight precepts for proximity and purity, from which I've said, "Don't harm all lives, don't steal another's property, don't behave lustfully and don't speak falsely, drink alcohol in dissipated places, visit flowers and dances, and eat loudly and out of season; now I've abandoned them all and have upheld the eight pure precepts."

source_sentence: 第二、第三亦如是說。
translation: The second and third are likewise explained.

source_sentence: 佛告婆羅門：「善哉！
translation: The Buddha told the Brāhmaṇa, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 如是應作，如是應持。」
translation: Thus shall it be done, and thus shall it be maintained."

source_sentence: 爾時世尊，說是法已，時婆羅門，及苾芻眾，諸人天等，皆大歡喜，信受奉行。
translation: After the Bhagavān explained this teaching, the Brāhmaṇas, the congregations of monks and nuns, and humans and gods rejoiced greatly and faithfully accepted and approved of it.

source_sentence: 長爪梵志請問經
translation: Sutra of the Questions of Brahmā with Long Jaw
